page.title: 03SCHOOL LIFE IN WOOLMER GREEN
page.content: There are two primary schools in the area one in{Oaklands}and one in {Woolmer Green,}both are different. Oaklands school is{30 years old}and there are 230 children with 7 teachers in 7 classes and another part time teacher.There is a maximum of 35 children per class.The school covers an area of only 0.5 hectares,so Oaklands have to use Woolmer Green school field for football.The land used to belong to a house which is still there.{ At{Woolmer Green}school there are 75 pupils,26 infants and 46 juniors,with 3 teachers and 5 classrooms.It has 1.6 hectares of land. There are two buildings one is 22 and the other is {125 years old.}The school has just celebrated the{125th BIRTHDAY}of the old building.Markings on the wall show where children sharpened slate pencils
